title: Christmas card with man pulling bell cord
marks:
Inscription

on back, URC, in pencil: [7C]
description: printed in black on rust red thick paper; image of thin man wearing tall top hat, knickers and striped socks, pulling on a bell cord, with a glowing lantern at his feet; top corners of image rounded off with images of Christmas trees; text above and below image:  \"Merry Christmas / The Holzschuhs\"
creditline: Gift of James C. and Kathryn L. Hogan
